items.title: Today only: Lexar’s 2TB SL300 portable SSD is nearly 50% off at $100 low
items.summary:
Today only, as part of the Deal Zone offers at B&H, you’ll find Lexar’s 2TB SL300 portable SSD down at $99.99 shipped with a $20 coupon that auto-applies during checkout. This particular drive hit the scene towards the tail end of last year carrying a $180 price tag. Today’s limited-time offer at B&H with an additional coupon delivers a 44% markdown, shaving $80 off its usual going rate. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this SSD, and it’s a pretty good option to consider for folks looking for a reliable drive for backups. Head below for more details.

items.summary:

Apple will unleash its latest and greatest with some all-new colorways, a giant leap in battery life on the pro model, and the all-new ultra-thin Air form factor. Previous rumors suggested we will be seeing some price increases on the mid-range model and the Pro-grade handsets, and although that might not be the case (it could just be a higher starting storage tier), some folks might rather land a deal on the previous-gen models and wait for a chance to score a 17 at a better price down the road.

Fanttik X8 Ace 150 PSI Portable Bike Pump

Buy for $23 (Reg. $28)

Apply code X8ACEDDEAL during checkout

What we love

If you have got an e-bike, scooter, or something along those lines, it can be easy to overlook filling the tires when the process of airing them up feels like an inconvenient  and time consuming ordeal. This palm-sized pump is battery-powered and aims to make it about as easy as possible to dial in your desired PSI and then let it do all of the heavy lifting.

items.title: All of the Switch 2 games releasing in September 2025
items.summary:
While we all eagerly await the rumored announcement of the September Nintendo Direct, we are also coming to realize this will be the first month without a single first-party Switch 2 release. Now clearly Hollow Knight: Silksong just broke the internet for a short time when it released last week, the eShop included, and that is frankly more than enough to keep most gamers busy all month long, but there are a host of other third-party games that have already and are still to land in September for Switch and Switch 2.

Clip the on-page 20% off coupon.

If the 2-meter MagSafe 3 cable that Apple includes with its MacBook lineup doesn’t offer quite enough reach for you, this 10-foot option is worth a look. Even when full price, it clocks in at only $20, but today’s deal takes another $4 off.
